article:
{{Infobox Racecourse |Name=Aqueduct |Image= |Location=South Ozone Park, Queens,
New York United States |Owner=State of New York & Operated by New York Racing
Association |Opened=September 27, 1894 |CourseType=Flat/Thoroughbred
|Website=http://www.nyra.com/index_aqueduct.html |NotableRaces=Wood Memorial
Stakes (G1) Cigar Mile Handicap (G1) Carter Handicap (G1) Gazelle
Stakes (G1) Gotham Stakes (G3) }} 'Aqueduct Racetrack' (nicknamed the 'Big
A') is a thoroughbred horse-racing facility and racino in South Ozone Park,
Queens, New York. Its racing meets usually are from late October/early November
through April.
categories: Horse racing venues in New York
Sports venues in Queens, New York
